TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSchemaTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將端對端事件的追蹤或偵錯輸出導向至 XML 編碼、符合結構描述的記錄檔。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output of end-to-end events to an XML-encoded, schema-compliant log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的端對端的結構描述符合規範事件的追蹤。The class provides tracing of end-to-end schema-compliant events. 您可以用於具有跨執行緒的異質元件的系統中的端對端追蹤，程序，與電腦界限。You can use end-to-end tracing for a system that has heterogeneous components that cross thread, , process, and computer boundaries. 標準化的事件結構描述 (請參閱[事件的事件取用者的表示法](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) 已定義為跨越這些界限啟用追蹤。A standardized event schema (see [Event Representation for Event Consumers](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) has been defined to enable tracing across these boundaries. 結構描述可以用來加入自訂的結構描述相容的項目。The schema enables the addition of custom, schema-compliant elements. 您可以使用[Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)顯示事件資料。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the event data. 會為記錄效能微調與隱含支援無鎖追蹤。 is tuned for logging performance with implicit support for lock-free tracing. 類別將追蹤和偵錯資訊的 XML 編碼的文字資料流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 在本章節稍後的表格會顯示 XML 輸出的描述。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables later in this section. 您可以啟用或停用物件透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用 設定應用程式中的物件。You can enable or disable an object through the application configuration file, and then use the configured object in your application. 或者，您可以在其中建立程式碼中的物件。Alternately, you can create an object in your code. 我們建議您透過應用程式組態檔啟用追蹤接聽項。We recommend that you enable trace listeners through the application configuration file. 如需使用追蹤和偵錯的組態檔的資訊，請參閱[追蹤和偵錯設定結構描述](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/index.md)。For information about the use of configuration files for tracing and debugging, see [Trace and Debug Settings Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/index.md). 若要設定物件、 修改組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure an object, modify the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以新增、 移除或設定接聽程式的屬性。In this file, you can add, remove, or set the properties for a listener. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` 類別會繼承屬性的基底類別從。The class inherits the property from the base class . 屬性是用來一層額外的接聽程式在篩選的追蹤輸出。The property allows for an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果某個篩選的話`Trace`追蹤接聽程式呼叫的方法方法的篩選，以判斷是否要發出的追蹤。If a filter is present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. 如果嘗試寫入檔案正在使用或無法使用 GUID 尾碼會自動加入至檔案名稱。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is being used or is unavailable, a GUID suffix is automatically added to the file name. > [!NOTE] > 接聽程式的方法是由方法呼叫， ，和類別。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 請勿直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫的接聽程式的方法。Do not call the listener methods directly from application code. 接聽程式主要是供類別。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 下表描述的元素和屬性的 XML 輸出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|屬性Attributes|輸出Output|注意Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字元，例如 > 或 < 逸出序列就會被取代。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 請參閱下表中的逸出的字元轉譯表格。See the escaped character translation table in the next table.| |`Computer`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|這個項目代表的值屬性。This element represents the value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|永遠存在。Always present.|如果`ActivityID`未指定，預設值是空的 GUID。If `ActivityID` is not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取決於是否存在`relatedActivityId`中的參數`Trace`方法呼叫。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the `Trace` method call.|`RelatedActivityID`屬性會對應`relatedActivityId`參數方法。The `RelatedActivityID` attribute corresponds to the `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`Data`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|這個項目代表參數的輸入 (`data`)。This element represents parameter input (`data`). 每個資料物件提供一個項目。One element is provided for each data object. 在事件記錄檔的情況下`Data`項目包含逸出的 XML 資料。In the case of event logs, the `Data` element contains escaped XML data. 在資料記錄`Data`項目包含未逸出的資料。In the case of data logs, the `Data` element contains unescaped data. 將資料記錄輸出會使用`ToString`傳入的資料物件的方法。The data log output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`Event`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|此元素會包含追蹤事件。This element contains a trace event.| |`EventData`|無None|事件記錄檔存在。Present for event logs.|這個項目代表參數的輸入 (`message`， `args`)。This element represents parameter input (`message`, `args`). 它包含`Data`透過呼叫建立的逸出 XML 資料的項目方法。It contains `Data` elements with escaped XML data that is created by calling the method.| |`EventID`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|這個項目代表參數的輸入 (`id`)。This element represents parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessID`|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|`ProcessID`屬性中指定。The `ProcessID` attribute is specified in the . Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millenium 版本作業系統中，如果`ProcessID`大於 2147483647，它是負數的正面表示法，並且應該轉換來取得正確的處理序識別碼。On the Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millenium Edition operating systems, if `ProcessID` is larger than 2,147,483,647, it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|呈現時`ProcessID`存在。Present when `ProcessID` is present.|`ThreadID`屬性中指定。The `ThreadID` attribute is specified in the .| |`Level`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|這個項目代表參數的輸入 (數值`eventType`)。This element represents parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 大於 255 的參數值會當做層級 8，表示輸出。Parameter values that are larger than 255 are output as a level 8, which represents . 追蹤事件類型， ， ， ，和當做層級 1、 2、 4、 8 和 10，分別為輸出。Trace event types , , , , and are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|只有一個邏輯作業可以存在。Only one logical operation can exist. 因此，此值會寫入做`LogicalOperation`下的節點`LogicalOperationStack`項目。Therefore, the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`OpCode`|無None|呈現時`Level`大於 255。Present when `Level` is greater than 255.|此項目代表追蹤事件類型的數值大於 255。This element represents Trace event types that have numeric values greater than 255. ， ， ，或當做層級 1、 2、 4、 8 和 10，分別為輸出。, , , , or are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`Provider`|`GUID`|永遠存在。Always present.|一律空白。Always empty.| |`RenderingInfo`|`Culture`|永遠存在。Always present.|這個屬性所表示的事件類型的資源字串。This attribute represents a resource string for the event type. 它一律是"en EN\\"。It is always "en-EN\\".| |`System`|`Name`|永遠存在。Always present.|| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|值時屬性。The time is the value of the property. 這個屬性會以國際標準時間This property is expressed as Coordinated Universal Time| |`TimeStamp`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|這個項目中指定。This element is specified in the .| |`UserData`|無None|呈現資料記錄檔。Present for data logs.|這個元素包含`Data`元素和未逸出，使用者所提供的資料，從方法。This element contains `Data` elements with unescaped, user-provided data from a method.| 下表會顯示在 XML 輸出逸出字元。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 逸出發生中的所有項目和屬性除了`UserData`元素，其中包含使用者所提供，未經逸出的資料。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes except for the `UserData` element, which contains user-provided, unescaped data. `UserData`項目是對呼叫的結果方法。The `UserData` element is a result of calls to the method. |逸出的字元Escaped character|值Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/CPP/eventschematracelistener.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需效能考量`bufferSize`和`maximumFileSize`應為 1024 個位元組的倍數。For performance considerations, `bufferSize` and `maximumFileSize` should be multiples of 1024 bytes. `maximumFileSize` 不是絕對值，很可能會超過最後一則訊息的大小超過上限臨界值。`maximumFileSize` is not an absolute value, it is a threshold which can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需效能考量`bufferSize`和`maximumFileSize`應為 1024 個位元組的倍數。For performance considerations, `bufferSize` and `maximumFileSize` should be multiples of 1024 bytes. `maximumFileSize` 不是絕對值;很可能會超過最後一則訊息的大小超過上限臨界值。`maximumFileSize` is not an absolute value; it is a threshold that can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/vb/program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int BufferSize { get; }
.property instance int32 BufferSize
Public ReadOnly Property BufferSize As Integer
public: property int BufferSize { int get(); };
member this.BufferSize : int

summary.span: 取得輸出緩衝區的大小。

span.span: Gets the size of the output buffer.

value.span: 輸出緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size of the output buffer, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值由設定`bufferSize`建構函式的參數。The property value is set by the `bufferSize` parameter in the constructor. 基於效能考量，緩衝區大小應該設為 1024 個位元組的倍數。For performance reasons, the buffer size should be set to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 我們建議 32 \* 1024 個位元組的預設大小，或是 64\*1024 個位元組，為了達到最佳效能。We recommend either the default size of 32\*1024 bytes or 64\*1024 bytes for best performance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的自訂屬性可以在 XML 組態檔中用來控制行為的執行個體的類別。The custom attributes that are returned by this method can be used in the XML configuration file to control the behavior of an instance of the class. 使用任何其他屬性，會造成組態例外狀況。Using any other attribute causes a configuration exception. 方法陣列值會傳回下列字串:"bufferSize"，"logRetentionOption"，"maximumFileSize 」，和 「 maximumNumberOfFiles"。The method for the returns the following string array values: "bufferSize", "logRetentionOption", "maximumFileSize", and "maximumNumberOfFiles".

summary.span: 取得記錄檔的最大大小。

span.span: Gets the maximum size of the log file.

value.span: 最大檔案大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum file size, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值由設定`maximumFileSize`建構函式的參數或`maximumFileSize`組態檔中的屬性。The property value is set by the `maximumFileSize` parameter in the constructor or the `maximumFileSize` attribute in the configuration file. 基於效能考量，您應該設定檔案大小上限為 1024 個位元組的倍數。For performance reasons, you should set the maximum file size to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 屬性值不是絕對; 很可能會超過最後一則訊息的大小超過上限臨界值。The property value is not an absolute; it is a threshold that can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. 下表顯示可能的和預設值的檔案大小與每個追蹤記錄的保留選項相關聯。The following table shows the possible and default values for file size that are associated with each trace log retention option. 標示為 n/A 的值，指出屬性不會檢查該值。The values marked as N/A indicate that the property is not checked for that value. |TraceLogRetentionOptionTraceLogRetentionOption|檔案大小上限Maximum file size|預設的檔案大小Default file size| |-----------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| ||N/AN/A|-1-1| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊、單一資料物件和事件資訊寫入至記錄檔。

span.span: Writes trace information, a single data object, and event information to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`寫入之前，參數會轉換為不帶正負號的整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，負`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`參數以寫入`Data`中的節點`UserData`項目。The `data` parameter is written as a `Data` node in the `UserData` element. `ToString`資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換為字串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`寫入之前，參數會轉換為不帶正負號的整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，負`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 方法呼叫而`format`字串和`args`陣列會傳遞為參數。The method is called and the `format` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 這個方法會格式化`args`物件陣列，並將格式化的陣列，做為寫入`Data`中的節點`EventData`項目。This method formats the `args` object array and writes the formatted array as the `Data` node in the `EventData` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊 (包括相關活動識別)、訊息和事件資訊寫入至記錄檔。

span.span: Writes trace information, including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information, to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將相關的追蹤相互關聯。The method is used to correlate related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`寫入之前，參數會轉換為不帶正負號的整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，負`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`參數會撰寫為`Data`項目。The `message` parameter is written as the `Data` element. 方法呼叫以將轉換`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式化字串，就會出現在標頭。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId` value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `Opcode`在頁尾中的項目會識別為追蹤事件類型。The `Opcode` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 不應該由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The method should not be called by application code. 它要供發出的追蹤資訊的物件及其方法。It is intended to be used by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫以記錄訊息事件。The method is called to log the message as an event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteLine (string message);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteLine(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteLine (message As String)
public: override void WriteLine(System::String ^ message);
abstract member WriteLine : string -> unit override this.WriteLine : string -> unit

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 將後面跟著現有行結束字元的訊息寫入至記錄檔，不提供任何其他內容資訊。

span.span: Writes a message followed by the current line terminator to the log file without providing any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫以記錄訊息事件。The method is called to log the message as an event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 取得或設定會寫入記錄檔的基礎文字寫入器。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying text writer that writes to the log file.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的 set 存取子嘗試屬性會引發。An attempt to use the set accessor for the property raises a .

exception.span: 嘗試指派值給 屬性。

span.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to the property.
